scripts.copy-fonts: cp -R node_modules/bootswatch/fonts/ src/main/resources/webapp/fonts/bootstrap && cp -R src/main/webapp/google-fonts/ src/main/resources/webapp/fonts
scripts.clean: rm -Rf src/main/resources/webapp/css && rm -Rf src/main/resources/webapp/fonts && mkdir -p src/main/resources/webapp/css && mkdir -p src/main/resources/webapp/fonts/bootstrap
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy-fonts && npm run build-sass
